pr_title: fix: Use JSON string instead of java object for JMS message

timeline.message: use json string instead of java object

timeline.bodyText: Can you just inject the objectMapper directly instead? unless you have a specific need for renderService
timeline.author: mortenoh

timeline.bodyText: Should this really be log level info? I think maybe we should use the async notifier system for this? like we do for other info messages from the tracker (since its async now)
timeline.author: mortenoh

timeline.bodyText: Should we just break out if == null ? then we don't need this extra level of indent?
timeline.author: mortenoh
mortenoh

timeline.bodyText: Can you add a small Javadoc to explain what's the return type? I assume the String as key of the Map is an Enrollment UID
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/dhis-2/dhis-services/dhis-service-tracker/src/main/java/org/hisp/dhis/tracker/TrackerProgramRuleService.java b/dhis-2/dhis-services/dhis-service-tracker/src/main/java/org/hisp/dhis/tracker/TrackerProgramRuleService.java
index 323ff43637..ad3605f705 100644
--- a/dhis-2/dhis-services/dhis-service-tracker/src/main/java/org/hisp/dhis/tracker/TrackerProgramRuleService.java
+++ b/dhis-2/dhis-services/dhis-service-tracker/src/main/java/org/hisp/dhis/tracker/TrackerProgramRuleService.java

@@ -43,7 +43,21 @@ import java.util.Map;
  */
 public interface TrackerProgramRuleService
 {
+    /**
+     * It feeds in enrollments given in {@link TrackerBundle} into rule engine and return a map of provided enrollments and
+     * their associated rule effects which are returned by rule engine.
+     *
+     * @param trackerBundle
+     * @return Map containing enrollment uid and its associated rule effects.
+     */
     Map<String, List<RuleEffect>> calculateEnrollmentRuleEffects( TrackerBundle trackerBundle );
 
+    /**
+     * It feeds in events given in {@link TrackerBundle} into rule engine and return a map of events and
+     * their associated rule effects.
+     *
+     * @param trackerBundle
+     * @return Map containing event uid and its associated rule effects.
+     */
     Map<String, List<RuleEffect>> calculateEventRuleEffects( TrackerBundle trackerBundle );
 }

timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

@@ -28,9 +28,11 @@

+import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;

timeline.bodyText: Can we rename JmsTemplate to JmsTopicTemplate so that it's clear what each template is for?
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio
